name: Monkey Man Enclosure
description:
Made for the HEXCODE x THEME SHOWDOWN JAM 2

Hosted by (Dallas) Society of Play 

The main constraint of this Jam was to create a game using only a certain color palette and have it themed upon the pallet's name all voted upon and released at the start of the Jam, Dream.

Story

You are an employee at a zoo and apparently a man sleep-walked into the monkey exhibit last night wearing a monkey costume? Nobody other than you realizes that he is a human, so you must keep him fed throughout your shift. Also, don’t wake him up because that will stress him out!

Gameplay Tips
  • Wage is earned every hour (at the notches on the clock). Money is used to purchase throwable items.
  • Food pellets attract both monkeys and the monkey man. Can feed the monkey man.
  • Bricks scare both monkeys and the monkey man. Hitting monkey man with a brick makes him significantly more awake.
  • Bananas attract monkeys only.
  • Whistle forces all monkeys to stop and walk towards the camera. Whistling makes the monkey man significantly more awake.
Controls
  • Left mouse click to select buttons and throw items. Deselect items by clicking on bottom left area of screen.
  • Escape/P to pause.
Unity Packages & External Assets
  • FlatKit
  • NavMeshComponents
Team

Sammy Mahmoudi - Director, Programming

Christopher Hahn - Assistant Director, Programming, Foley SFX

Lowlande52 - 3D Art, Rigging, and Animation

Zachary "ZOLTARR" Pitts - UI Art

Liz Gravis - Music, Synth SFX

Made with Unity Version 2019.4.22f1 (64-bit)
